assignRole(string,uint256).details: Assigns a role to an address

params.assigneeUser: The user id of the role assignee
params.roleName: The name of the role, constrained to 32 bytes

hasRoleByAddress(string,address).details: Checks an address has a particular role

params.assigneeUserAddress: The user address of the role assignee
params.roleName: The name of the role, constrained to 32 bytes

hasRoleByAddress(string,address).return: bool - true if they have the role, false if they do not have the role

hasRoleById(string,uint256).details: Checks a user has a particular role

params.assigneeUser: The user id of the role assignee
params.roleName: The name of the role, constrained to 32 bytes

hasRoleById(string,uint256).return: bool - true if they have the role, false if they do not have the role

revokeRole(string,uint256).details: Revokes a role from an address

params.assigneeUser: The user id of the role assignee to revoke
params.roleName: The name of the role, constrained to 32 bytes
